subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: A weekslong war of words between Lance Armstrong and the French anti-doping agency over a drug test grew louder as the agency said it could seek sanctions against the U.S. cyclist.
snippet: A weekslong war of words between Lance Armstrong and the French anti-doping agency over a drug test grew louder as the agency said it could seek sanctions against the U.S. cyclist.
